title: email notifications not coming in
content: I am having issues with notifications, but only specifically email related.  New emails through both GMail and Outlook (which is connected to my work) do not come through.  the email are there when I open the app, but no notifications.  All other notifications, like messages, gchat, etc. come through.  But emails have stopped and I have no idea why.   I am on Android 10, pixel 2.
